name: EndZ Village
detailed_description:
Village building game in the age of collapse Simulation of the construction of a village in the Zombie Age, Players must research and develop the village. Add forces Build a strong base to attack many zombies. Resource management in food and construction , The game will continue. And found unexpected events with players Or to send explorers to explore various places To increase the manpower and resources of village.


- Simulation of the construction of villages in the Zombie Age
- Construction of villages through desperation
- Search for resources to build a village
- Catch genes to develop populations
- Prevent attacks from zombies During the development of the village
- Develop weapons to increase attack power and defense



Farming is an important part of the game.
- Corn wheat farming
- Animal husbandry system To produce food
- Fishing

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows7/8/10 64-bit
  • Processor: Intel i5-2300 2.8 GHz
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia GeForce GTX 460 or similar AMD Radeon (no support for onboard cards)
  • DirectX: Version 10
  • Storage: 1 GB available space
